name: Loot 'n' Scoot
description:
Loot 'n' Scoot is a local multiplayer game that requires the play to use strategy, skill and luck to locate, and dig up treasure before escaping off the island with the precious booty! Use mischievous tactics to fool enemies into thinking you may know where the treasure is.

Break barrels to add pieces to your treasure map. Find the matching location on the island and start digging for treasure. If you do find the treasure, be careful.. the challenge has just started, other island dwellers can take your treasure and claim it for themselves! Run for a boat with the treasure to escape the island and live in luxury.
